2:
--------------------
Text: Lloyd Fredendall:  In February 1943, while in command of the II Corps, his forces were defeated by German forces commanded by "Generalfeldmarschall" Erwin Rommel and "Generaloberst" Hans-Jürgen von Arnim in the Battle of Kasserine Pass.
